Interface AddressProviderFactory

All Known Implementing Classes:

A factory for AddressProvider objects.

    • createAddressProvider

      AddressProvider createAddressProvider(ClassLoader loader)
      Create a new AddressProvider using the specified class loader.
      Parameters:

      a new AddressProvider
